vocabulary.definition: the natural home where an animal lives
vocabulary.example: The forest is a perfect habitat for bears

vocabulary.definition: a group of animals that are very similar
vocabulary.example: There are many species of butterflies in the garden

vocabulary.definition: an animal that feeds milk to its babies
vocabulary.example: A whale is the largest mammal in the ocean

vocabulary.definition: an animal with scales that lays eggs
vocabulary.example: A snake is a reptile that slides on its belly

vocabulary.definition: active at night and sleeping during the day
vocabulary.example: Owls are nocturnal birds that hunt at night

vocabulary.definition: a group of animals that live and travel together
vocabulary.example: The herd of elephants walked across the savanna

vocabulary.definition: an area that an animal claims as its own
vocabulary.example: The lion marked its territory with scent

vocabulary.definition: something animals know how to do without being taught
vocabulary.example: Birds build nests by instinct

vocabulary.definition: an animal that hunts other animals for food
vocabulary.example: The eagle is a skilled predator with sharp talons

vocabulary.definition: an animal that is hunted by other animals
vocabulary.example: The rabbit was quick enough to escape its prey

vocabulary.definition: colors or patterns that help animals hide
vocabulary.example: The chameleon's camouflage made it invisible on the branch

vocabulary.definition: to move from one place to another with the seasons
vocabulary.example: Monarch butterflies migrate thousands of miles south

vocabulary.definition: to sleep through the cold winter months
vocabulary.example: Bears hibernate in caves during the winter

vocabulary.definition: an animal that eats only meat
vocabulary.example: A tiger is a carnivore that hunts other animals

vocabulary.definition: an animal that eats only plants
vocabulary.example: A giraffe is a herbivore that eats leaves from tall trees

vocabulary.definition: a special feature that helps an animal survive
vocabulary.example: A polar bear's thick fur is an adaptation to cold weather

vocabulary.definition: all the living things in an area and how they work together
vocabulary.example: The rainforest ecosystem has many different animals

vocabulary.definition: in danger of disappearing forever
vocabulary.example: We must protect endangered animals like pandas

vocabulary.definition: the variety of different living things in one place
vocabulary.example: The rainforest has incredible biodiversity

vocabulary.definition: protecting animals and nature from harm
vocabulary.example: Conservation efforts help save endangered species
